review: The best part and reason for buying it is AirPlay, otherwise save your money and get a Roku!Two drawbacks:1.) limited subscriptions when compared to Roku and Apple is very slow to add new ones.2.) While AirPlay allows Macs running Mt. Lion and other iOS 6 devices to connect wirelessly and show content, there is a serious lagging problem through the Apple TV. Video that streams cleanly on laptop or other device is often just a little behind the computer or LOTS behind the computer with complete stalls.  No good fix in any forum so far.
